resources:
TourismApp TOP DESTINATIONS PLACES TO GO
// Arrays
// Name of the places
Borobudur
Mount Bromo
Komodo National Park
Lake Toba
Ubud Monkey Forest
Gili Island
// Location of the places
Central Java, Indonesia
East Java, Indonesia
East Nusa Tenggara, Indonesia
North Sumatra, Indonesia
Bali, Indonesia
West Nusa Tenggara, Indonesia
// Description of the places
Borobudur temple is the worlds biggest Buddhist sanctuary.
This volcano is one of the most iconic sights from Indonesia.
Here you can find the mighty and otherworldly lizard, the Komodo Dragon.
Lake Toba is one of Indonesia most beautiful lake.
At this Hindu temple, you will see many long-tailed macaques.
These picturesque islands offer beaches that rival those of Bali in their beauty
